snippet.title: Raptor - RPG Gameplay and Long Trailer - Multi Platform Raptorpg
snippet.description:
Hunt down and defeat Dinosaurs for food and DNA in the large beautiful environments! 
Take down lots of Dinosaur species, predators and prey. 
Unlock customizations such as Heads, Colours, Pets and furniture for the Hub (home). 
Decorate your Hub by pushing decorations and edible objects, table, campfire, fruit, pineapples and more! 
Special end boss Mecha T-Rex, battle it on the Moon in low gravity! 
Wear the heads of your defeated Carnivore rivals, Spinosaurus and Tyrannosaurus Rex! 
Collect DNA to unlock additional customisation features such as pets, Dragons, Pterosaur, Butterfly and more! 

9 Skins, 9 Heads, 9 Pets, 9 Hub decorations, 9 species of Dinosaurs!

Long trailer / gameplay from Raptor RPG
This is a remake of the mobile game made around 2009.

Platforms: PS Vita, iPhone, iPod, iPad, Android and Kindles.

External website review: 
http://indiepitome.com/2014/08/26/raptor-rpg-review/

Video gameplay by LatestVitaGames:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MG07gsvpLA8
